about.title: Transforming ideas into real interfaces
about.text1: Hello! I'm João Vitor, a developer in training with a focus on Front-End and building modern web applications. I'm constantly evolving my skills and applying current technologies to create intuitive interfaces and meaningful digital experiences.
about.text2: I have practical experience in data management, web development, and analysis tools, always seeking to deliver organized, scalable projects with attention to performance and usability. My goal is to grow as a Full Stack Developer, learning and contributing to real projects.
